API reference¶

pflacs means faster load-cases and parameter studies.

  • Loadcase

Loadcase¶

class pflacs.Loadcase(name=None, parent=None, parameters=None, pyfile=None, data=None, treedict=None, vnpkl_fpath=None)[source]¶

Class for creating pflacs nodes.

Parameters:
  • name (str or None) – node name
  • parent (Node or None) – The parent node of this node.
  • data (dict or None) – Dictionary containing node data.
  • treedict (dict or None) – Dictionary specifying a complete tree.
_hdf_fpath¶

Attribute that indicates the path for the HDF5 file.

plugin_func(func, module=None, argmap=None, newname=None)[source]¶

Patch a function into «Loadcase» class as an instance bound method.
